uptick.translation[0].definitions[0].def: a trade of shares at a higher price than that of its previous trade
uptick.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: The general rule is that shares can be sold short only on an uptick.
uptick.translation[0].definitions[1].def: an increase or improvement in the level of something
uptick.translation[0].definitions[1].exa: There may be an uptick in housing construction.
